Room.Name: Mulberry Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling on Mulberry Road, which connects Kista and Oceancrest.
Room.LongDescription: The serenity of this beautiful roadway fills your mind with tranquility and peaceful thoughts as you walk along here. In the distance to the south is the city of Kista, while Oceancrest lies to the north. On a moonlit night the view of the Lithium Inlet to the east is truly an awe inspiring sight.
